item.createmechanicalcompanion.mechanica:
§8Spawns a §7Mechanical Wolf§r§8 to protect the wearer.
You can open the module interface by right-clicking it or heal it by using a wrench.
When the §7Mechanical Wolf§r§8 dies, it will respawn with the modules equipped after a short cooldown.

§8Found in §6Illager Workshops§8.
You can find §6Illager Workshop Maps§8 when trading with cartographers or wandering traders.
§8Used to make the §7Mechanical Wolf§8.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.netherite: §8Adds more armor, additional health and fire immunity to the §7Mechanical Wolf§8.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.mounted_c: §8Adds a mounted crossbow to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8that only damages its target.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.tesla_tai: §8Adds a Tesla Tail to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8that damages its attackers.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.smelting_: §8Grants fire damage to the §7Mechanical Wolf§8 and gives it fire immunity.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.booster_r: §8Adds a boost of speed to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8when it finds a target.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.quantum_d: §8Allows the §7Mechanical Wolf §8to teleport to its target.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.regenerat: §8Gives the §7Mechanical Wolf §8the ability to regenerate health.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.mob_radar: §8Highlights hostile mobs near the §7Mechanical Wolf §8even through walls.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.blueprint: §8Decorative item that can be placed on walls.
entity.createmechanicalcompanion.ownersh: §cThis Mechanical Wolf doesn't belong to you.
createmechanicalcompanion.tip.map_tip: Rumors speak of maps to §6Illager Workshops§r hidden deep in dark forests. Check with a cartographer or wandering trader!
